other_tests.findings: Leukocytoclastic vasculitis involving small blood vessels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings diagnostic of leukocytoclastic vasculitis confirmed with immunofluorescence studies showing moderate-to-intense staining for IgG, IgA, and C3.

other_tests.findings: Moderate-to-intense staining for IgG, IgA, and C3 in a granular, perivascular pattern consistent with vasculitis.

other_tests.date: Six days before the current evaluation
other_tests.findings: Diffuse bilateral scleral injection, worse in the right eye, chemosis, and decreased tears.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvement observed after administration of glucocorticoid ophthalmic drops and lubricant solution.
